price: ហើយជាការពិតណាស់ យើងបានបង្កើតមនុស្សលោកអំពី ដីស្អិតស្ងួតចេញពីដីភក់ខ្មៅដែលត្រូវគេសូនជារូបរាង។
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
